attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: presntly employees received one weeks payment for every year of service up to a maximum of 20 years, ie. 10 years service would equal 10 weeks payment. On the principle of one weeks pay for every year of service, why the cut off ? I propose that employees receive one week for easch and every year of employment without any cut off.
